website_summaries.verdict: Powerful, 7- to 9-inch rotary polisher for experienced users and professionals.
pros: Variable speed ranges from 600 to 3,500 rpm
Electronic control maintains desired speed even under load
Has heat-treated, precision-cut steel gears for long life and dependability
cons: Heavy unit that may be hard to use for overhead work

customer_reviews.title: You’ll get 1 year of use if  using it for daily production
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd Dewalt buffer I’ve purchased in 2 years. You get about a year out of this buffer then it’s tine to purchase another one. Please understand this is used on a daily basis in a high production collision shop. Great buffer at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It’s a professional tool and out dose everything I have ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a professional tool and out dose everything I have used in the past way fast and a way nicer shine
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, just wish it came with a case. I was worried about burning paint but this has adjustable speeds and can pretty much use any head. I had a flawless detailing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Steve T.

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely the best buffer in this price range and the Amazon price ...
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the best buffer in this price range and the Amazon price is better than you'll find elsewhere. At least for new in box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Machine
customer_reviews.text: Tool very heavy and solid, truly professional quality. Tiring to use for extended period of time, but that is just the nature of the beast. Used it to compound 30 ft boat and it clearly will last a lifetime. Maybe smaller, lighter polishers, but this is a real keeper and very good exercise. Fairly priced as this could easily cost 2 to 3 times more, it is of that quality level. As you think your arms are about to fall off, remember it is exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B

customer_reviews.title: Liars
customer_reviews.text: This product did not come with the components in the description! I am super upset! This was a Father’s Day present for my father!
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product so far. We'll see how it holds up but out of the box the variable speed is a great feature. It's smooth and quiet. I bought it for personal use so it should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: The Chad

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy using it
customer_reviews.text: I use this tool every day, and it does the job well! I really enjoy using it. I am glad I purchased one, due to the kit at work being used by several, and now I have one of my own, so I can keep on working without problems!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: High price for old "BRUSH" technology!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe that I paid this much for old tech!!! This thing has brushes and it really is my fault for thinking that Dewalt was leading the pack. I thought that surely this product wouldn't have brushes but it sure enough does. I probably will send this junk back. Again, this is my fault for not looking into it more.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L. House

customer_reviews.title: Nut is weird
customer_reviews.text: The hex nut that comes with the sanding disc is difficult to tighten. Seems like they made something simple complicated. Otherwise seems like a pretty nice grinder.
customer_reviews.author: AlasCat

customer_reviews.title: It's dewalt and it's Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Typical Dewalt quality item. Be careful it will burn paint and this is not for a novice or someone just learning. Great value and will last you a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Robinson

customer_reviews.title: decent polisher
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to handle compared to some of the other styles of polishers.
customer_reviews.author: Lonfu

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool, expect years of use
customer_reviews.text: Its a good machine for polishing scratches in your vehicle top coat. Shipped without pads, i bought 2 separately. using a 3m wool pad, and 3m polishing pad, and your favorite compounds, waxes, you can easily restore the luster to a scratched up clear coat.
customer_reviews.author: B. Stankiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Yes.  Get it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My 4th dewalt angled tool. I did have a grinder burn up from abuse, but the others are kicking @$$. This polisher is awesome, so far... only used on one project as of yet. Auto paint store sells for $250.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall W DeNys

customer_reviews.title: Bad trigger, bad something
customer_reviews.text: Purchased new April 2017, see pics, the tool is like new......We deploy this polisher for a particular finish on metal every 3-4 months for approx 15 min for a total of 6-8 hours currently on this tool. So I'm at our shop the other day and my friend has the same exact Dewalt multi speed polisher with the same exact problem. I'm going to reach out to Dewalt for assistance seeing we have now (2) " two " of these with very low hours not working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You don't have to push down to use this machine, the way is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, the variable speeds are good for beginners, perfect weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt does it again
customer_reviews.text: Was everything I wanted and more. This will be around for years
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Husbands been wanting one. His eyes lit up when he opened the box
customer_reviews.author: candy

customer_reviews.title: Mostly OK
customer_reviews.text: The tool works well, and polishes as expected. The speed control however is not as smooth as on other variable speed tools that I have. No matter how slowly and evenly I press the trigger, the tool still jerks when starting. Once started, it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: zgb

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the most part.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for polishing. Only problem is the on/off switch placement. If not careful handling it, the unit will be accidentally turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very massive
customer_reviews.text: It was way too big and bulky made it to well
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Solid Choice
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Feels solid. Good torque. Convenient speed control. Quieter than some cheaper polishers. Should out last me.
customer_reviews.author: JRM

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: well built polisher. purchased to buff topside finish on a large boat- excellent results
customer_reviews.author: dgltrader

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great buffer! Looking forward to using it for rehabbing our new/old boat!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dineen

customer_reviews.title: Professional Grade
customer_reviews.text: Great product, DeWalt never disappoints, truly professional grade, been using this specific type of polisher for years and I'd never change it.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Loudest polisher I've ever heard.
customer_reviews.text: The gears in the head of this thing makes my ears ring after a while. Also, no matter how smoothly I squeeze the trigger it still jerks around. Great heavy duty product otherwise. I'd look elsewhere for an automotive polisher; this seems better suited as a grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Shultz

customer_reviews.title: Will not last.
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully you don’t plan on using it very long mine lasted only hours. But for them few hours it was great. It started cutting off for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: Alix Belcher

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and perfect for daily use in body shop
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and perfect for daily use in body shop
customer_reviews.author: Sweet T

customer_reviews.title: I polished an entire Airstream trailer with this thing, ...
customer_reviews.text: I polished an entire Airstream trailer with this thing, and it's still rock solid. If it ever breaks, I'll buy an exact duplicate.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: ordered this polisher to work on a set of wheels and they never set it to me... be careful
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Avery

customer_reviews.title: great price for a great product
customer_reviews.text: priced very reasonable top of the line product arrived a day before scheduled great service
customer_reviews.author: doug sheets

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on a weekly basis for about a year now and it has performed flawlessly. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nate J.

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: You cannot go wrong with a Dewalt companies get a good reputation for a reason and yoon you will get no less with this awesome buffer
customer_reviews.author: cirilo reyes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool, Minor changes to the tool it self I will directly contact DeWalt
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bindner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great machine! It has a high RPM surge on low speed settings but still great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Auto Body Mans Delight!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this handy tool to buff my personal vehicles but it can also be used for sanding and grinding if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Paparilly

customer_reviews.title: The choice of professionals
customer_reviews.text: A very powerful little on the heavy side Polisher, I purchased it because of the people on YouTube who makes her living Polish aluminum all day long on trucks & trailers swear Dewalt last the longest for its price, There is a German polisher that supposedly lasts a lot longer but it three times the cost It didn't make sense for me. I would purchase it again, No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Who me?

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The variable speed of this product adds to safety while useing.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great Produts!
customer_reviews.text: Dewalt lives up to its reputation a very high quality product. I love fact I could change the RPM's. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Elias Lizaola

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great rotary polished, was a little concerned buying it used but works great and arrived just as described.
customer_reviews.author: April Boyde

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Happy With Product
customer_reviews.text: We used the unit three times and it died. The untit we replaced, same model number, was used for years with no issues. After calling DeWalt, they said becasue it was over 30 days old I had to send it to the repair center for repair becasue it was purchased through Amazon and not through DeWalt? It is there now and will be down for about two weeks. I would think hard before I purchased another DeWalt product.
customer_reviews.author: Firechief24

customer_reviews.title: great wheel for all your needs
customer_reviews.text: runs like i always wanted from a wheel. kinda wish it included a velcro pad for me wheel. only thing is the makita wheel is slightly lighter than this one but this is balanced with the weight really well. i got my boats shiny and looking new
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hranchook

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: The polisher is a great addition to our detail shop. We use them every day and they do their job wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up well
customer_reviews.text: Just over two months old, quit working. Not a good tool. This is the second one I bought. both tools died.sent the first one in on warranty died two weeks later. Worse than harborfreight!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Successful polish
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first two of three steps in polishing an old airstream trailer held sideways and used the clay bars successfully very messy job but great results final step is with a cyclo
customer_reviews.author: PK C.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Machine is awesome however I wasn't aware that this was a type 1, therefore if the handle breaks the replacement is almost as much as a new machine.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M

customer_reviews.title: The inside is the same as any other machine. ...
customer_reviews.text: The inside is the same as any other machine. By changing the surface, (i.e. outer color of plastic), you have a different product. Not impressed hence 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: use this buffer daily, they last about 2 years before burning up. So I just buy a new one every 2 years, this is making the dealership money so is a acceptable lifespan. Should last a homeower 10+ years...
customer_reviews.author: rky222k

product_meta.title: DEWALT Variable Speed Polisher, 7-Inch to 9-Inch (DWP849),Medium
product_meta.description: 7"/9" Variable speed Polisher has a powerful, 12.0A all ball-bearing construction motor for long life. Electronic control maintains specified speed under load delivering desired finish results. Conveniently located variable speed dial lets user set maximum speed from 600/3500 RPM for different materials and applications. Variable speed trigger allows user to control speed from 0 to dialed maximum setting. Heat-treated, precision-cut steel gears for smooth operation.
feature_bullets: Powerful, 12.0-Amp, all ball-bearing construction for long life
Electronic control maintains specified speed under load delivering desired finish results
Conveniently located variable speed dial lets user set maximum speed from 600/3500 rpm for different materials and applications
Variable speed trigger allows user to control speed from 0 to dialed maximum setting
Heat-treated, precision-cut steel gears for smooth operation
Powerful, 12.0-Amp, all ball-bearing construction for long life
Electronic control maintains specified speed under load delivering desired finish results
Conveniently located variable speed dial lets user set maximum speed from 600/3500 rpm for different materials and applications
Variable speed trigger allows user to control speed from 0 to dialed maximum setting
Heat-treated, precision-cut steel gears for smooth operation
